Yahoo Developer Network | Sunnyvale, CA | https://developer.yahoo.com | Full Time | Onsite

Weâ€™re hiring frontend hackers and developer advocates who are passionate about developer communities. You will be working on building developer tools and interfaces using nodeJS, react, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. An ideal candidate will act as a guide to our partners, helping them to integrate Yahoo Developer technologies in their products.

To apply, please email your resume to the following address ydn.jobs@yahoo-inc.com.

Learn more: https://developer.yahoo.com/jobs/
